name: Aerodyne Flight Center
about: Aerodyne Flight Center, located in Scottsdale, Arizona, offers innovative and professional flight instruction for all levels, from private pilot to commercial. Co-owned by Doug Cox, the school is renowned for its personalized training and utilization of the FAA's Wings program to enhance pilot proficiency. With a fleet that includes the Cessna 172 and Cessna 310 for multi-engine training, Aerodyne ensures students have access to well-maintained aircraft. The school emphasizes efficiency, flexibility, and safety, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a comprehensive and supportive learning environment. Aerodyne Flight Center is committed to helping pilots achieve their goals while promoting aviation safety through ongoing proficiency training.
